price: “Odoo dachii keessa maleykonni tasgabbaa’anii deeman kan jiraatan ta’ee, silaa maleykaa samii irraa ergamaa taasifnee isaan irratti buufna turre” jedhi.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَلَٰٓئِكَةٞ يَمۡشُونَ مُطۡمَئِنِّينَ لَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَلَكٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna fī al-arḍi malāikatun yamshūna muṭ'ma-innīna lanazzalnā ʿalayhim mina al-samāi malakan rasūlan
